name: light-of-ruin
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/2 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
Drawing power from the Eternal Flower,
the user fires a powerful beam of light.
This also damages the user quite a lot.
